author: marianodelorenzo
title: The manhattan at times square
text: Great hotel "the manhattan at times square". Jackie and Allison rules! The best hotel employees in town. The location, the bed. The view. The sheets... great. I look forward to come back next time. The heating wasnt optimal but they arrange it for me. Thanks.
